Reviews.Title: Durable
Reviews.Author: IdahoNate
Reviews.Content: I dropped this camera down a granite slab while rock climbing.  The lens was out, but luckily the camera tumbled end over end.  The case was pretty dented up, but it still works.  Can't get much more durable than that for a relatively inexpensive camera.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: M. Sicard
Reviews.Content: compact and looks nice/good quality.  The screen is clear - not grainy like some cheap brands are.  I am very pleased.

ProductInfo.Features:
Image resolution up to 3456 x 2592
4x digital zoom, 16x HD Zoom
2.6-inch wide format LCD is perfect for playback on wide screen TVs
Face recognition sets the focus, exposure and flash
Features YouTube Capture Mode, a best shot setting that allows users to shoot at the optimum size and quality settings for YouTube
ProductInfo.Name: Casio EX-Z85AEO 9.1MP Compact Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.6-Inch Wide-Format LCD
